The dragon javelin is a type of Ranged ammunition used by the Light ballista and the heavy ballista. They are the strongest type of javelin.

They can be fletched by attaching dragon javelin heads to javelin shafts at level 92 Fletching, granting 225 experience per 15 javelins made.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 October 2016
 Hotfix

The Ranged Strength bonus of dragon javelins has been decreased from +175 to +150 due to it being too powerful when paired with the heavy ballista and ranged Void Knight equipment.[1]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Mod Archie. "Ballista/Javelin Stat Changes." October 31, 2016. Old School Announcements Forums.

The '''dragon javelin''' is a type of [[Ranged]] ammunition used by the [[Light ballista]] and the [[heavy ballista]]. They are the strongest type of javelin.

They can be fletched by attaching [[dragon javelin heads]] to [[javelin shaft]]s at level 92 [[Fletching]], granting 225 experience per 15 javelins made.
